Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.20580677]HIV-1 IIIB:inhibition of virus replication in PM1-CCR5 cells(EC50=2.5±0.76 μM);HIV-1 Bal:inhibition of virus replication in PM1-CCR5 cells(EC50>10 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: Peptide derived from the RNA-binding domain of HIV-1 Rev can act as dual-target inhibitors that inhibit HIV-1 entry and viral production in the early and late phases of replication.

Literature.Title: Rev-derived peptides inhibit HIV-1 replication by antagonism of Rev and a co-receptor, CXCR4.
Literature.Reference: Int J Biochem Cell Biol. 2010 Sep;42(9)1482-8.
Literature.Author: Shimane K, Kodama EN, Nakase I, Futaki S, Sakurai Y, Sakagami Y, Li X, Hattori T, Sarafianos SG, Matsuoka M.
